animeDescription: An obscure anime video animated by Toei that also functions as a fire safety Public Service Announcement. Very little is known about the video and details regarding distribution, plot and character names can only be deduced by the video itself.  (Source: MarioWiki)
animeRelated: ['Super Mario Brothers: Peach-hime Kyuushutsu Daisakusen!', 'Amada Anime Series: Super Mario Brothers']
